name: 步摇 BÙ YÁO [VR]
description:
步摇 BÙ YÁO Oriental Style VR Horror Game

This is the final VR project of CC: Unity

🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨🟨 Please download the APK file at the end. Launch with Oculus Quest 2 or other compatible VR headsets 🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸 Team:

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸 Concept:

Referenced and influenced by the idea of ghost marriage, we create BÙ YÁO as a horror escape room game that fuses an oriental theme. The concept is a game within a game. "BU YAO" is a game that the main character (player) is trying to play in his/her own room, but then player got pulled into the game accidentally. The goal is to find clues along the exploration of the haunted house and get back to reality. We also feature 3 endings (one is still in development) to the gameplay. Player's choices along the way will influence the result. 

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸 Gameplay Highlights:
  • Reality vs. Game:

Player starts off in his/her own room (reality), trying to play a computer game named "BUYAO". However, player falls into the world of the game and he/she needs to get out.

  • Lighting & Candle: 

We deliberately set the room to be dark at first. The only way for the players to see clearly what's surrounding is to light up the candles along the way. We employ this interaction to let players explore the area on their own and create an uncanny feeling.

  • Dialogue: 

Along the way, players will sometimes hear a disturbing voice talking, telling players what to expect (only hints, not directions) Players can interact with objects to trigger the dialogue.

  • Reflection & Mirror:

Mirror is the first scary moment players going to encounter. And the interaction is mandatory in order to proceed to next area and to get an important clue for the ending. We want to use the mirror reflection to create a shocking and scary moment.

  • Fulu (cursed papers): 

Fulu 符咒 is the cursed paper that often used to seal ominous object/signs. The interaction with Fulu is another important part of the game because they are set to seal the key object to escape the world from player's reach. And player needs to figure out a method to get rid of the Fulus.

  • Bu Yao (hairpin): 

As implied by the main title, Bu Yao 步摇 is the key to this game. Bu Yao is a common hairpin used by ancient Chinese women. Especially for brides, they often wear a significant amount of beautiful hairpins for decoration purposes. At the very end of the game, player needs to make a bold move to interact with the ghost bride and get the Bu Yao (hints are implied in mirror :)

🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸 Background on Ghost Marriage (冥婚):

Ghost Marriage is a marriage in which one or both parties are deceased. It is usually set up by the family of the deceased and performed for various reasons, including: the death of an engaged person before the wedding, to integrate an unmarried woman into a patrilineage. BU YAO referenced from this idea and the bride character is a victim of ghost marriage. 

These information can also be found during the gameplay.
